lead_paragraph: Italy's conviction of Amanda Knox for the murder of her British roommate when the two were exchange students together could spur a drawn-out fight over extradition in the United States, where supporters contend she is the victim of a faulty foreign justice system.

headline.main: Amanda Knox Conviction in Italy Could Spur Lengthy Extradition Fight
headline.print_headline: Amanda Knox Conviction in Italy Could Spur Lengthy Extradition Fight
